wikipedia_page.main: Steve Bent (born 9 April 1961) is a British former cyclist. He competed in the individual pursuit and team pursuit events at the 1984 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1984 Summer Olympics

response: Hala Jaber was married to award-winning news photographer Steve Bent until his death on Christmas Day 2011.
